sec.p: To understand natural variation in stress and give us the ability to compare with captive populations, we quantified plasma corticosterone (CORT) using enzyme immunoassays (Cayman Chemical, Ann Arbor, MI, USA; kit #500655) as in [ 71]. All samples were run in duplicate or triplicate and any pair with coefficient of variation (CV) greater than 15% were re-analyzed. Inter- and intra-assay CVs were 5% or less. The assay platform was validated for use in A. yniphora. Serial dilutions of pooled plasma yielded curves that were parallel to the standard curve (ANCOVA, P > 0.05). Accuracy was assessed using recovery of known standard additions to pooled plasma ( r 2 = 0.98; mean recovery = 94.3 Â± 4.2%).
